title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 4, pt. 638 - Energy Assistance Reimbursement Claiming
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 4, pt. 638 - Energy Assistance Reimbursement Claiming

State Regulations
§ 638.1 - Reimbursement for energy assistance
§ 638.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for energy assistance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 4, pt. 638

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 97, 131, 131-a, 153, 153-f, 303

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
